titleStmt.title: A trial of the Romish clergies title to the Church by way of answer to a popish pamphlet written by one A.D. and entituled A treatise of faith, wherein is briefly and plainly shewed a direct way, by which euery man may resolue and settle his mind in all doubts, questions and controuersies, concerning matters of faith. By Antonie Wotton. In the end you haue three tables: one of the texts of Scripture expounded or alledged in this booke: another of the testimonies of ancient and later writers, with a chronologie of the times in which they liued: a third of the chiefe matters contained in the treatise and answer.
titleStmt.author: Wotton, Anthony, 1561?-1626.

titleStmt.title: A trial of the Romish clergies title to the Church by way of answer to a popish pamphlet written by one A.D. and entituled A treatise of faith, wherein is briefly and plainly shewed a direct way, by which euery man may resolue and settle his mind in all doubts, questions and controuersies, concerning matters of faith. By Antonie Wotton. In the end you haue three tables: one of the texts of Scripture expounded or alledged in this booke: another of the testimonies of ancient and later writers, with a chronologie of the times in which they liued: a third of the chiefe matters contained in the treatise and answer.
titleStmt.author: Wotton, Anthony, 1561?-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Richard Field] for Elizabeth Burby widow, and are to be sold at the signe of the Swan in Pauls Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Fisher, John. A treatise of faith.
Running title reads: A triall of the Romish clergies title to the Church.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
